refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: MsgAud is part of the additional information associated with a message in a MsgSet. It identifies the audience to which a particular Msg is relevant.

refsection.title: Processing expectations
refsection.para: DocBook doesn't specify anything about how a particular audience might be identified, or how different audiences are distinguished.
On the whole, the semantics of MsgSet are not clearly defined.
